house_listing.house_description: Rex. Titan model on canal lot. Awesome kitchen. 1st floor bedroom or office. Huge lot. Price includes long list of standard features,jacuzzi tub,deck,ceramic tile,upgraded appliances. Still time for many buyer selections.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic Fan, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Microwave,Office, Pantry, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
